manuscripts. (See The New Oxford Annotated Bible, ed. by Bruce Metzger and Roland Murphy,
Oxford University Press, 1991.) I would not, of course, be thought to suggest that any member
of the early Christian Church might have tampered with the text of Mark, to bring it into line
